TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FirstChanceExceptionEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 在公共语言运行时开始搜索事件处理程序之前，为托管异常首次出现时引发的通知事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the notification event that is raised when a managed exception first occurs, before the common language runtime begins searching for event handlers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类为有权访问异常的事件提供异常处理程序。This class provides the exception handler for the event with access to the exception. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个名为`Child_0` `Child_3`的应用程序域系列, 其中`Worker`每个应用程序域中有一个对象。The following example creates a series of application domains named `Child_0` through `Child_3`, with a `Worker` object in each application domain. 每`Worker`个对象都有一个对`Worker`下一个应用程序域中的对象的引用`Worker` , 最后一个应用程序域中的除外。Each `Worker` object has a reference to the `Worker` object in the next application domain, except for the `Worker` in the last application domain. 此事件在除之外`Child_1`的所有应用程序域中进行处理。The event is handled in all application domains except `Child_1`. 创建应用程序域后, 默认应用程序域将为第一个`TestException`子应用程序域调用方法。When the application domains have been created, the default application domain calls the `TestException` method for the first child application domain. 每`Worker`个对象都`TestException`为下一个调用方法, 直到最后`Worker`引发处理或未处理的异常。Each `Worker` object calls the `TestException` method for the next, until the last `Worker` throws an exception that is either handled or unhandled. 因此, 当前线程通过所有应用程序域, 并`TestException`添加到每个应用程序域中的堆栈中。Thus, the current thread passes through all the application domains, and `TestException` is added to the stack in each application domain. 当最后一个`Worker`对象处理异常时 , 只会在最后一个应用程序域中引发事件。When the last `Worker` object handles the exception, the event is raised only in the last application domain. 其他应用程序域绝不会有机会处理异常, 因此不会引发事件。The other application domains never get a chance to handle the exception, so the event is not raised. 如果最后一个`Worker`对象不处理异常 , 则会在具有事件处理程序的每个应用程序域中引发事件。When the last `Worker` object does not handle the exception, the event is raised in each application domain that has an event handler. 每个事件处理程序完成后, 堆栈将继续展开, 直到默认应用程序域捕获到该异常。After each event handler has finished, the stack continues to unwind until the exception is caught by the default application domain. > [!NOTE] > 在事件处理程序中`e.Exception.Message` `FirstChanceHandler` , 若要查看随着事件更接近且更接近于默认应用程序域, 堆栈显示`e.Exception`方式如何增长。To see how the stack display grows as the event is raised closer and closer to the default application domain, change `e.Exception.Message` to `e.Exception` in the `FirstChanceHandler` event handlers. 请注意, `TestException`当跨应用程序域边界调用时, 它会出现两次: 一次用于代理, 一次用于存根。Notice that when `TestException` is called across application domain boundaries, it appears twice: once for the proxy and once for the stub. [!code-csharp[System.AppDomain.FirstChanceException#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.firstchanceexception/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.AppDomain.FirstChanceException#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.appdomain.firstchanceexception/vb/example.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Exception exception) cil managed

param.name: exception
param.span: 刚才由托管代码引发的异常，该异常将由 事件检查。

span.span: The exception that was just thrown by managed code, and that will be examined by the event.

summary.span: 使用指定的异常初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数由公共语言运行时调用, 而不是由应用程序代码调用。This constructor is called by the common language runtime, not by application code.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Exception As Exception
public: property Exception ^ Exception { Exception ^ get(); };

summary.span: 与托管代码中引发的异常对应的托管异常对象。

span.span: The managed exception object that corresponds to the exception thrown in managed code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理事件的方法可以检查异常并执行适当的日志记录或其他通知服务。The method that handles the event can examine the exception and perform appropriate logging or other notification services. 有关示例代码，请参阅 。For example code, see .
